conclusion: Need to analyze the velocity-time graph to determine if the particle has returned to its starting point at the 3-second mark.
Initial velocity of the particle at t = 0 is 2 m/s.
Final velocity of the particle at t = 3 seconds is -2 m/s.
Since the particle's velocity changes from positive to negative, it is moving away from the origin.
The particle does not return to its starting point at t = 3 seconds.
Since the particle does not return to the starting point, the answer is no.
